title: Which companies do online auditions currently? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi Pra: I assume you meant K-POP. If you are, here are some links- K-Pop company is on the search for new idols, opens online audition for everyone JYP ONLINE AUDITION. Apply. Vocal. K-pop, pop, etc. (No limit in genre). Singing capacity based on breathing, pitch, rhythm, pronunciation and technique. JYP Audition http://www.fantagio.kr/en/auditions/periodical Links on Facebook- Kpop Audition But if you are auditioning for acting, here are couple of links- Online Auditions - Project Casting online auditions | Auditions Free

Which K-pop entertainment companies can you send an online ... https://www.quora.com/Which-K-pop-entertainment. Its mostly big companies which you can audition online to. I looked some of them up (there's more, but those are mostly in Korean), so you can pick between them: Starship- Starship Entertainment audition! (스타쉽 엔터테인먼트 오디션!) There are more, but these are the ones I could find. Good luck if you audition! Fighting! What does Google know about me?
